Name: Chastity Catastrophe
About the game: Chastity Catastrophe is a action platformer where instead of beating up enemies, you break your friends out of chastity equipment! It's a DRM-free game made for Windows, Mac, and Linux computers with the following features: Unlock your Horngry friends by hitting them with your sledge hammer! Pair up characters in-game so that they can cuddle-- and also have sex. Over 40 unique animations to discover. Explore a fantasy world full of anthropomorphic dragons, kobolds, and wolves. Solve the mystery of the ongoing chastity crisis!
